scripts.build: cd traccar-web && npm install xlsx @sentry/vite-plugin @sentry/react maplibregl-mapbox-request-transformer && npm run generate-pwa-assets && export VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && npm run build
scripts.rebuild: rm -rf traccar-web deploy && npm run prebuild && cd traccar-web && npm install xlsx @sentry/vite-plugin @sentry/react maplibregl-mapbox-request-transformer
scripts.poststart: grep -v 'base: "/traccar",' vite.config.js > traccar-web/vite.config.js && cd traccar-web && npm run start
